definition: appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential
difference/discrepancy/to differ/error/to err/to make a mistake
to differ from/to fall short of/lacking/wrong/inferior/Taiwan pr. [cha1]

sentences.english: We obtained also the relation between gravity and the phase difference of the atom gravimeter.
sentences.chinese: 得到了原子重力儀的相位差與重力加速度的關係。

sentences.english: This allows for skewing and rotation of graphics objects.
sentences.chinese: 這允許圖形對象的相位差和旋轉。

sentences.english: Signal recording method, phase difference detecting circuit, and information apparatus.
sentences.chinese: 信號記錄方法，相位差檢測電路，及信息裝置。

sentences.english: It's an important factor to measure phase difference for studying phase frequency characteristics of the network.
sentences.chinese: 相位差的測量是研究網絡相頻特性的一個重要方面。

definition: filtering radio waves (i.e. to pick out one frequency)
angle of drift (navigation)/deflection (from course)/angle of divergence
